message: I'm being generous, but I'm sure you understand the value of time.  Accept this and we both get something. Reject, and we both risk losing a lot more.
Time is ticking, but I'm willing to compromise. Take it or leave it.
This is my final offer. The money keeps shrinking. If we don't agree now, we'll both lose out big time.
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect it to last.
